titles.title: A resolution expressing United States support for the Government of the Philippines.

calendar.text: Submitted in the Senate. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 17.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Yea-Nay Vote. 98-0. Record Vote No: 29.

bill.summary: 2/5/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Senate: (1) reaffirms U.S. support for Philippine President Corazon Aquino on the occasion of the approval of the new Philippine constitution; (2) commends President Aquino for progress toward democracy in the Philippines; and (3) praises the continued commitment of the Philippine Government and people to strengthen their democracy and achieve economic, political, and military reform.
